Text: Due to an unplanned delay at the event, tonights planned show has been split into two episodes by ITV4 - I will be uploading tomorrows show, but it will be a couple of hours latter than usual 'coz I'm out on the raz for my mates' birthday... :)

You have consistently provided us with Formula 1, MotoGP and now the Isle of Man TT go out on the raz all you want for whatever reason you want, everyone deserves a break.  Thank you again so much I would never have seen any of it without you.
